Intro: Big believer in constant self-improvement and growth. Productivity freak and a philomath with an eclectic range of interests. Iâ€™ve been into the world of programming since 2012. I started with C++, then Java, .NET (C#) and in later years JavaScript, PHP and Python. My focus in the field right now is Full Stack Web Development with expanding interest in Mobile Development, Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence.

Passions.Name: Weightlifting
Passions.Desc: To perform at my best I have to stay in shape. Simple as that. Can't function properly unless I get a therapy session regularly. Most of my bussines and application ideas came while in the gym. The rest - in the shower.

Passions.Name: Rockclimbing
Passions.Desc: As someone who fears heights, rockclimbing has recently became a chanllenging but rewarding hobby. Quite addictive, as well.

Passions.Name: Music
Passions.Desc: Life without music would be a mistake - as Nietzsche said. I agree as a wholehearted consumer and occasional creator.

Passions.Name: Software Development
Passions.Desc: I consider myself above anything, a creator. What best field to explore than software development where you have the power create almost anything. Be a god. As it's extremely wide field - it can be hard to focus. My main focus is currently web development, mobile, machine learning and artificial intelligence.
